functions: All functions must be: Function NameStartingUpperCase(<paramsStartingLowerCase>)<ReturnType\nReturn <expression>\nEnd Function

both: Use of the keyword '{1}' is not permitted
Use of ArrayList is not permitted. Use a typed list such as List(Of Integer)
Use of '{1}', or any other method that mutates a List is not permitted
functions: Use of '{1}' is not permitted here, as this would make the function dependent on a variable not passed in as a parameter
